name: Human Caring
description:
Human Caring is in a world where humans are not the predominant species. You're only a pet in a cat world.

Your Master fears for your health for a new disease has been discovered. How are the humans going to handle it ? 

Try to go outside of your cat's house and see what it is all about. After a few attempts at getting out and trying to go to the other side of the road, people - and yourself - will start to understand how to reduce the disease effects.

Controls : wasd/arrow keys and space to jump

***So this the first game I have ever made, please give me your feedback on it :) ***
